description.value:
A suit of armor constructed to match an ancient order of knights that served a long dead god. This armor is adorned with engravings of stars, moons, and old magical and religious symbols related to the night and the moon.

This armor counts as Dawnsilver armor, however, this is a magical effect, and not an inherent material of the armor. It can be dispelled for 10 minutes with Dispel Magic, along with its other magical effects.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e-misc.our-items.Item.02arSfsC5HBzyP9Q]{Effect: Moon Warden's Frost}

Activate - Moonlight Gaze 1-2 (concentrate, divine)

Frequency once per day

Effect You chant prayers to your deity, causing the symbols on the armor to glow with a soft moonlight that envelopes your eyes and gives you the ability to see what is real.

You gain low-light vision and darkvision for 10 minutes.

If you spent two actions to activate Moonlight Gaze, you gain the effects of a 2nd-rank @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.jwK43yKsHTkJQvQ9]{See the Unseen} spell.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e-misc.our-items.Item.tetPjmxCXEvYNxD0]{Effect: Moonlit Gaze}

Craft Requirements The initial raw materials must include 25 gp of silver. You must worship a deity whose concerns and/or domains include the Moon, Stars, or Night.
